description.value: Scenario 1.6, test 2/2 for eOverdracht receiving systems. This test focuses on the handoff phase ('overdrachtfase'). In a normal scenario, the test for the negotiation phase ('aanmeldfase') has been completed before running this test, although it may be performed in isolation.

nts:include.description: At the sending XIS, the Task resulting from the negotiation phase is updated with a reference to the nursing handoff Composition on Task.input.

nts:include.name: Await nursing handoff addition notification
nts:include.description: The sending XIS sends a notification to the receiving XIS because the Task has been updated with a reference to the nursing handoff Composition.

description.value: The receiving XIS should perform a read on the Task after receiving a notification that the Task has been updated.
After reading the Task, the receiving XIS should detect that a reference to the nursing handoff Composition has been added and subsequently perform a read to retrieve this Composition.
The receiving XIS should set the status of the Task to 'completed'. This should be an update operation where the original Task is sent, with only the status element changed.
Confirm that the Task resource contains 1 Composition reference for the nursing handoff.
